name: acf/accordion
title: Accordion
description: A customizable accordion block with FAQ schema support.

acf_accord_groups.acf_accord_group_content: This plugin provides a collection of customizable ACF blocks for the WordPress block editor.

acf_accord_groups.acf_accord_group_title: How do I customize the styles?
acf_accord_groups.acf_accord_group_content: You can use the block style variations or add custom CSS classes for advanced styling.
Yes, you can enable FAQ schema from the block settings to improve SEO.
